mapper.select: select b.c_username cUsername,b.c_loginname cLoginname,ROUND(a.n_nlhz,2) nNlhz,a.c_userid cUserid,a.d_xgsj dXgsj from t_green_nl_hz a, plate_user b WHERE a.c_userid = b.c_userid AND a.c_zt='1' order by a.n_nlhz DESC,a.d_xgsj limit 0,10

select b.c_username cUsername,b.c_loginname cLoginname,a.n_nlhz nNlhz,a.c_userid cUserid,a.c_bz cBz from t_green_nl_hz a , plate_user b where a.c_userid = b.c_userid AND a.c_zt='1'
AND b.c_username LIKE "%" #{cUsername} "%"
AND a.n_nlhz >= #{nNlzlQ}
AND #{nNlzlZ} >= a.n_nlhz
order by a.n_nlhz,b.c_username desc

SELECT b.* FROM ( SELECT t.*, ROUND(@rownum := @rownum + 1) AS 'rank' FROM (SELECT @rownum := 0) r, ( SELECT * FROM t_green_nl_hz ORDER BY n_nlhz DESC ,d_xgsj ) AS t ) AS b WHERE c_userid = #{cUserid} AND c_zt='1'
